root.name: MoleZ
root.description: MoleZ is Worms in realtime with less cute and more blood and guts. 2-4 moles battle underground in destructible terrain with various weapons including molotov cocktails, shotguns, nukes and flamethrowers. MoleZ was a decent hit, but it's development was stopped in 1999 when the source code and tools were lost. It's available now as freeware.
